segments.text: I notice the woman drying her plate at the sink, with little regard to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the faucet is pouring over, and shockingly, she doesn’t see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A part of me wants to yell at her to turn around, but I remain silent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are whispering and giggling quietly, as if planning a covert operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of nostalgia watching the boy stretch for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable, but it’s also reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool shifting beneath him, and my heart skips a beat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him looks so innocent, just waiting for the reward of a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s all too easy to forget the dangers in this seemingly idyllic kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With the tidy garden outside in view, it feels like nothing could go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, chaos is creeping closer every second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets, the dishes, even the floor are all witnesses to this little mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s funny how one moment can hold such beauty and risk at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could pause time, just for a moment, to let the woman know.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she remains in her own world, blissfully unaware of the storm brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
